return.value: FSM handle, can be used to determine (via completedFSM) when the execed FSM has finished. In Arma 3, the handle is also available inside the FSM in _thisFSM variable.

syntax.param: Arguments accessible as _this in the FSM

return.value: FSM handle, can be used to determine (via completedFSM) when the execed FSM has finished. In Arma 3, the handle is also available inside the FSM in _thisFSM variable.
